scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, clad in a blue mantle, is seated and holds the Christ Child on her lap. Both figures are depicted with halos and are offering a red rose. To the left, an angel with large blue wings, also with a halo, is kneeling and looking towards the Virgin and Child. The background features a decorative tapestry-like pattern of red and gold foliage. The figures are situated on a green ground, and to the right, a wooden chair is visible. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
scene_interpretation: Madonna and Child with an Angel
